title: PBE account not working
body: i was issued  a PBE account be the link to to create an account is broken. i have the launcher setup i just need to make the account but i cant. If i could get some help on this subject matter, it would be very appreciated.

replies.body: PBE signups are closed at the moment, and even though you've been accepted you won't be able to create that account for the time being. I don't have an ETA on when they'll be back up, but you can check the status on the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZunREMru,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-15T23:58:50.497+0000)
>
> PBE signups are closed at the moment, and even though you've been accepted you won't be able to create that account for the time being. I don't have an ETA on when they'll be back up, but you can check the status on the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).

Is there an ETA on an ETA? There's a lot of people waiting, some for weeks.
